name: Le Petit Caporal- BETA
description:
Napoleon, wielded by his trusty but rather oversized flintlock pistol, needs to reach the top, if he wants to become the ruler of Europe.

can you help him?

In this climbing platformer you will aim and fire an enormous pistol in order to throw Napoleon into the air. with an easy to learn- hard to master mechanic with a complicated level design will test your gaming abilities, and will leave the losers furious.
